treatment.reference: Thermoproteales: a novel type of extremely thermoacidophilic anaerobic archaebacteria isolated from Icelandic solfataras Zbl.Bakt.Hyg., I.Abt.Orig.C 2:205-227
treatment.description: Presence of polyisoprenoid ether lipids. Resistant to rifampicin, streptomycin, vancomycin and chloramphenicol. Organic substrates include glucose, ethanol, malate, and formamide.
